The plant features palmate leaves with three to five lobes, and it produces showy, lantern-shaped flowers in shades of yellow, orange, or red. It thrives in full sun to partial shade and prefers well-drained soil. The plant is often cultivated for its ornamental value and is relatively drought-tolerant once established.
